name: tapo-camera-mcp
description: MCP server for controlling and monitoring TP-Link Tapo security cameras
author: Sandra Schi

prompts.name: camera_status_prompt
prompts.description: Get the current status of the Tapo camera
prompts.template: What is the current status of the {camera_name} camera? Show me {details_level} information.

prompts.name: start_stream_prompt
prompts.description: Start a video stream from the camera
prompts.template: Start a {stream_type} stream from the {camera_name} camera with {quality} quality and {with_audio}audio.

prompts.name: stop_stream_prompt
prompts.template: Stop the {stream_type} stream from the {camera_name} camera.

prompts.name: ptz_control_prompt
prompts.template: Move the {camera_name} camera {direction} at {speed} speed for {duration} seconds.

prompts.name: motion_detection_prompt
prompts.template: {enable_disable} motion detection on the {camera_name} camera with {sensitivity} sensitivity and {zones} zones.

prompts.name: camera_info_prompt
prompts.template: Show me {details_level} information about the {camera_name} camera.

prompts.name: recording_control_prompt
prompts.template: {start_stop} {recording_type} recording on the {camera_name} camera with {quality} quality.

prompts.name: camera_snapshot_prompt
prompts.description: Take a snapshot from the camera
prompts.template: Take a snapshot from the {camera_name} camera and save it as {filename} with {resolution} resolution.
